title: Temperance
description: The Temperance card shows an angel with wings, being both male and female. The angel balances with one foot on the rocks, illustrating the need to stay grounded, and one foot in the water, showing the need to be in flow. She holds a cup in each hand, pouring water between them. In the background, is a path leading up to a mountain symbolizing a journey to a higher understanding. The card represents finding balance and harmony in life.
